...
Specifies the main ingredients of a banana split. Remember the following:
One banana
Two banana
Three banana
Four
Four bananas make a bunch and so do many more.
root rock-group mess-of-fun
<split> <banana instrument='guitar'>Fleegle</banana> <banana instrument='drums'>Bingo</banana> <banana instrument='bass'>Drooper</banana> <banana instrument='keyboard'>Snorky</banana> </split>
